1073200.name: Achievement Hunters - Soundtrack
1073200.description:
Soundtrack and Sound effects of the game "Achievement Hunters"!
In addition to the bad game, we present you the soundtrack. Listen to it whenever you feel to do so.

Soundtrack List:

01 - Alphabet (3:06 min)
02 - Life is hard (3:19 min)
03 - Admeen (2:20 min)
04 - Butter (3:16 min)

The tracks are available as MP3 in the "\steamapps\common\Achievement Hunters\AchievementHunters_Soundtrack.
1073200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
